remarks:
Any ordinal class is a subclass of the class of ordinal numbers. Corollary 7.15 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 38.  (Contributed by NM, 18-May-1994.)  (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 12-Aug-2011.)

 Any ordinal class is a subclass of the class of ordinal numbers. Corollary 7.15 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 38.  (Contributed by NM, 18-May-1994.)
statement: ordsson $p |- ( Ord A -> A C_ On ) $.
